snippet: President Mwai Kibaki fired an assistant minister after he was charged in court with inciting clashes in the southeast that have killed 110 people in three weeks.
abstract: President Mwai Kibaki of Kenya fires an assistant minister who was charged with inciting clashes in the southeast that have killed 110 people and calls for tough measures to quell the violence.
lead_paragraph: President Mwai Kibaki fired an assistant minister after he was charged in court with inciting clashes in the southeast that have killed 110 people in three weeks.
